items.sentence: Write a thank-you note when someone goes out of his or her way to help you.
Sometimes rich people look down on other people who do not have much money.
Would you please pick me up at the hotel on Friday July 11th at 10:00 a.m.?
That wasn't the first time that Tom got kicked out of the bar for fighting.
Tom went out of his way to make sure that we had everything that we needed.
